text: 7 new books to read in July, including an in-depth examination of the role of Black voters in America and the subsequent suppression of voting rights, and an exploration of long-term friendships from the hosts of the hit podcast ‘Call Your Girlfriend.’ https://t.co/AWTg89k2bE
